entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
